About Wise Music

W1SE Music is a record label dedicated to recording and promoting cross-cultural high vibrational music. With unique sounds, inspirational lyrics, and passionate personalities expect unique music dedicated to raising the awareness of the world around us.

Releases

Explore the latest tracks artists

We support artists and give the best opportunities to to develop the performer as a person and become as a famous world star.
